Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: ランドグリーズ
Entry.EnglishText: Randgriz

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: イーフォン
Entry.EnglishText: Eephon

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: フェニア
Entry.EnglishText: Fenia

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.Notes: This place's name in the menu

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣よ、教えてくれ。 一体、何が起こっているんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred Beasts! Tell us just what is going on!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>の心より生まれし負の力が、 悪しき力となって、 世界を滅ぼさんとしておる。
Entry.EnglishText: The negativity born from the hearts of <Yellow>Man<White> has grown into an evil power that threatens to destroy the entire world.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダは、その負の感情が 他の街以上に高まり過ぎ、 あのような災いを呼んだのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The negative emotions in Razilda had grown far stronger than in any other city, and thus brought forth calamity unto itself.

Entry.JapaneseText: このまま放っておけば、 他の街も負の感情が招く災いによって 滅ぼされるであろう。
Entry.EnglishText: If the situation is not dealt with, the same calamity will befall the other cities of this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな…… ボクたち、色んな街へ行って、 みんなの争いを止めたのに……
Entry.EnglishText: No way... Even after we went to all those different places and stopped all the fighting?

Entry.JapaneseText: 目に見える戦いを止めても、 心に憎しみの火種がくすぶり続ける限り、 争いが消えた事にはならぬ。
Entry.EnglishText: You have only stopped the fighting that can be perceived with the eyes. So long as the embers of hate remain inside one's heart, they are bound to reignite conflict.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らの王が懸念していたのは このような事態だったのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: That such a situation would come to pass is precisely what our King had feared...

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣王の判断は、間違って いなかったのかもしれぬ。
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps the conclusion to which he arrived was the correct one after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: それって…… <Yellow>ヒト<White>を滅ぼすって事？
Entry.EnglishText: You mean... His desire to rid the world of <Yellow>Man<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そんなのって……!!
Entry.EnglishText: That cannot be the correct course of action!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣の皆さんの力で なんとかならないんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Are the Sacred Beasts truly powerless to stop this?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Yellow>ヒト<White>の心そのものを 私たちが左右するのは 許される事ではありません。
Entry.EnglishText: ...We possess not the authority to influence the hearts of <Yellow>Man<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: もうオレたちには 何もできないのか!? このまま滅ぶしかないのか!!
Entry.EnglishText: Is there really nothing else we can do? Do we really have no choice but to await our destruction?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界を救う方法はある……
Entry.EnglishText: There is still a way to save this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: 残されたただひとつの方法…… それは……
Entry.EnglishText: One sole hope remains... And that is...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……聖獣王の復活だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The rebirth of the King of the Sacred Beasts.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣王……？ ……ゲオルギアスの復活!?
Entry.EnglishText: The rebirth of the King of the Sacred Beasts... You mean Geyorkias?!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ…… この世界を司る聖獣王の力を もってすれば、この災いに 立ち向かう事ができるであろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... Only by possessing the power of our King will you be able to stand against this catastrophe.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、聖獣王は、 ヒューマせん滅の考えを 変えておらぬかもしれん。
Entry.EnglishText: However, he might be unwilling to change his mind on the annihilation of Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや…… この争いの状況からすると、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>そのものを滅ぼさんと するやも……
Entry.EnglishText: Though... Not just Huma, but all of <Yellow>Mankind<White> faces annihilation due to what these conflicts have wrought.

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアスを 説得できるかどうか…… というところか。
Entry.EnglishText: So in other words, the fate of <Yellow>Mankind<White> rests on whether or not we can convince Geyorkias.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ…… おぬしら<Yellow>ヒト<White>にとって、 これは最後の賭けだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Correct. This is the last chance for <Yellow>Mankind<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣王を甦らせるべきか否か、 もはや我々には判断できぬ。
Entry.EnglishText: Whether or not you revive the Sacred Beast King, it is not our place to judge.

Entry.JapaneseText: その答は…… おぬしらに委ねたい。
Entry.EnglishText: That decision is best left up to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうする？
Entry.EnglishText: What should we do?

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアス復活に賭ける。
Entry.EnglishText: We'll take our chances on Geyorkias's rebirth.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ小さくて弱いが、 ようやく光が見え始めたんだ。 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の心という光が……
Entry.EnglishText: I have finally started to see the light, as small and dim as it may be... The light known as the hearts of <Yellow>Man<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: それをゲオルギアスに 伝えたい。
Entry.EnglishText: I want to let Geyorkias know of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前、おぬしらが倒した 聖獣王は不完全だった。
Entry.EnglishText: The King of the Sacred Beasts that you defeated before was imperfect.

Entry.JapaneseText: 次に戦う事になれば、 命の覚悟が必要であろう。
Entry.EnglishText: If you come to battle him a second time, then you must be prepared to risk your very lives.

Entry.JapaneseText: 説得すれば 戦わなくても済むんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: But if we can persuade him, then we won't have to fight him, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマにガジュマ、 その両方を併せ持つ者。 心が入れ替わった女王と、 聖獣に作られた命。
Entry.EnglishText: We're a group of Huma and Gajuma, those in between, a Queen who's soul is in a different body, and a life created by the Sacred Beasts...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちは種族も生まれも違う。 だが、オレたちは手を取り合い、 ここまで来る事ができた……
Entry.EnglishText: Even though we're of different races and origins, we've still been able to work together to get this far...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちならできる…… 種族の共存を示すのに、 オレたち以上の存在はない。
Entry.EnglishText: We can do this... There is no better example of races coexisting than us!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……よかろう。 ならば、獣王山へ向かうのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Very well. In that case, go to Mount Sovereign.

Entry.JapaneseText: 獣王山!?
Entry.EnglishText: Mount Sovereign?

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカの北にある聖なる山です。 そこに、王家の者だけが知る 聖所があるのです。
Entry.EnglishText: It is a holy mountain that is north of Balka. Within it lies a sanctuary known only to the Royal Family.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに聖獣王の古き骸が 眠っておる……
Entry.EnglishText: That is where the old carcass of the King of the Sacred Beasts rests...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まさか、そんな所に……
Entry.EnglishText: To think that such a thing was there...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おぬしらが、聖獣王を 味方につけられるよう…… 祈っておる。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I pray that you will be able to win the King over to your side.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
